title: 本人从接触MCop到现在很多有用的指令，大神勿喷，只是给新手，
author: Cynthia丶
txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace{EntityId:Cow,SpawnCount:2,SpawnRange:6,RequiredPlayerRange:128,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:20}
   /setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{EntityId:Zombie,SpawnCount:2,SpawnRange:6,RequiredPlayerRange:128,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:20}
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 

{Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:264,Count:1},sell:{id:267,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:1000}],AttributeModifiers:[1]}}}]}}

/getcore 
/give XXX 137 命令 51火 52笼字91下届 119末 57钻快
/eco give @p 2 给钱 eco set 改变
/tp @p 坐标
/say 喊话
/summon EnderDragon 召唤魔影龙        EnderCrystal  /gamerule keepInventory true 死亡凋零
/gifts all 发礼服
/addxp 玩家 技能 等级/addlevels修改等级 save-all保存 res area listall 1 查看坐标
/res info 线

  /setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 

  {EntityId:EnderDragon }
/effect @p 1 9999999 7 调速度 /echest 魔影想
time set 4000 调时间的
/resadmin create op圈地
/speed fly 调速度
/ul 无限 /summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {TIME:1,tILE:54]
/more
/changepassword
/banitem add  理由 ban东西 banitem del 解除  /clearmyspawn :清除个人重生点    /setmyspawn :设置个人重生点    /myspawn :传送至个人重生点

resadmin confirm 删除
/mangaddv 权限组 prefix &?『』
 /manuaddv [id] prefix &『』
resadmin set 
/qs unlimited
/difficulty 0 和平模式
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
 /lac rmpass ID 移除登录密码
  /authme changepassword 修改密码
/powertool shock 闪电绑定东西  fireball 火焰
{Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:22,Count:1}},

{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:57,Count:1}},

{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:133,Count:1}},

{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:3,Count:1},sell:{id:41,Count:1}}]}}

/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ 

{ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:9999999,Ambient:1}],

Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:-1},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:350}],

Equipment:[{id:267,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:-1.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:No_Attack}]}},{id:313},{id:312},{id:311},{id:397,Damage:3,tag:{SkullOwner:Herobrine}}],

Invulnerable:1,CustomName:Herobrine,CustomNameVisible:1}

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content: 你没有发现有好多都是服务器指令吗？、、、

replies.author: Cynthia丶
replies.txt_content: 大多数新手腐竹都或多或少能用到

replies.author: One_Time
replies.txt_content: 楼主，上面一大段是什么

replies.author: wq80781
replies.txt_content: 看不懂上面一大串的是什么求解答
